# Developing stuff for the Open Tree of Life platform

An open lab notebook for software development.

## How to use it.

First, you will need to install jupyter notebooks. Follow some installation instructions [here](mds/install-jupnot.md)


Next, clone the opentre-ipynb Github repo into your computer with

`git clone git@github.com:LunaSare/opentree-ipynb.git`

Then:

Option 1. Open jupyter notebooks and navigate to the folder of the repo.

Option 2. Open a terminal and change directory to the folder of the repo.

do `jupyter notebook` and _voil√†_, this will launch the notebooks here on a jupyter notebook environment so you can test them by yourself
